subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[run]] [[fast]]; to [[rush]] about
# to [[flee]]; to [[escape]]
# to [[marry]] without the [[preliminary]] [[formalities]]
# [[rapid]]; [[hurried]]; [[hasty]]
